channel.title: Fiesta Jazz
channel.description:
Since October 2000, Fiesta Jazz has been playing Latin jazz from traditional, instrumental and vocal Afro-Caribbean, Spanish and Brazilian jazz, as well as Latin-influenced fusion played by non-Latin musicians, along with fusions of jazz and Latin American folk rhythms.

As a Venezuelan myself, the music expresses my Latin American and Spanish culture.

item.description:
La Rondallita - Un feliz año pa´ ti - Feliz Navidad compilation

Mambisimo Big Band - Sofrito - 5 años

Caribbean Jazz Project - A night in Tunisia - The colors of Latin Jazz: Cubop!

Barbera Combo - Time unfolded - Out on the street with you

Carl Tjader - Tokyo Blues - Several shades of Jade

Dave Pike - Peligroso - Peligroso

Ray Barreto & New World Spirit - Renewal - Trancedance

Itai Kriss - L´origine de l´aurbergine - All Aboard vol 2: Arrivals

Mestizo - Borrachero - Mestizo
